member.name: T:Comic_Downloader.CMD.IDownloader

member.name: T:Comic_Downloader.CMD.IResourceUriProvider

member.name: M:Comic_Downloader.CMD.IResourceUriProvider.GetUris(System.Uri,System.String)
member.summary: Get's all the files that will be downloaded. The implementation needs to be thread safe.

member.returns: A task that'll return all the necessary information to download the files.
